entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
